content: In what classic board game would you find properties named Boardwalk and Park Place?

The classic board game where you can find properties named Boardwalk and Park Place is Monopoly. Monopoly is a popular real estate trading and strategy game where players roll dice to move around the game board, buying and trading properties, and developing them with houses and hotels. The ultimate goal is to drive opponents into bankruptcy by building monopolies and charging rent. Boardwalk and Park Place are both high-value properties located on the board, and owning them can be very advantageous in the game.
